name: claude-code-orchestration
description: Multi-agent Claude Code development system with ATLAS integration

dev.description: Development agent responsible for implementing features and fixing bugs

review.description: Review agent responsible for code review and quality assurance

test.description: Testing agent responsible for writing and executing tests

atlas.command: claude mcp add atlas atlas-mcp-server --env ATLAS_NEO4J_URI=${ATLAS_NEO4J_URI}

context7.command: claude mcp add context7 npx context7@latest --project=claude-code-orchestration
